question: Jacinda Ardern, who was seen in news recently, is the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The Prime Minister of New Zealand Jacinda Ardern recently announced that the country had eliminated the transmission of the coronavirus.
New Zealand witnessed no new active case since February 28 and the last known infected person has recovered. Though the government will lift all restrictions imposed, strict border controls will be continued. It was also announced that only New Zealanders and their immediate families will be allowed to enter the country.
